ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hello All!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have 8 toons on Tarew Marr: Froondor, 44 wood elf druid Texxas, 35 wood elf ranger Froondar, 31 wood elf warrior Froonella, 29 high elf cleric Squiddles, 14
ygData.messageBody:
I have 8 toons on Tarew Marr:

Froondor, 44 wood elf druid
Texxas, 35 wood elf ranger
Froondar, 31 wood elf warrior
Froonella, 29 high elf cleric
Squiddles, 14 high elf magician
Froonvah, 13 vah shir beastlord
Squidd, 10 high elf enchanter
Ferfee, 10 dwarf warrior

as well as assorted toons on Firiona Vie (Bree, 9 wood elf ranger),
Quellious, and Zebuxoruk.

I guess you might say I like being an elf.
